hospitalizations.queries.DL: SELECT date, hospital_beds_occupied AS val FROM DL_patient_mgmt WHERE val IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date ASC;
hospitalizations.queries.KL: SELECT date, total_persons_in_hospital_isolation AS val FROM KL_cumulative_summary WHERE val IS NOT NULL AND date NOT IN ('2020-10-05', '2020-10-25', '2020-12-08', '2021-05-18', '2021-06-25', '2022-01-01') ORDER BY date ASC;
hospitalizations.queries.WB: SELECT date, current_patients_hospital as val FROM WB_hospital WHERE val IS NOT NULL ORDER BY date ASC;

hospitalizations.queries.60days.DL: SELECT date, hospital_beds_occupied AS val FROM DL_patient_mgmt WHERE val IS NOT NULL AND date >= DATETIME('now', '-60 day') ORDER BY date ASC;
hospitalizations.queries.60days.KL: SELECT date, total_persons_in_hospital_isolation AS val FROM KL_cumulative_summary WHERE val IS NOT NULL AND date >= DATETIME('now', '-60 day') AND date NOT IN ('2020-10-05', '2020-10-25', '2020-12-08', '2021-05-18', '2021-06-25', '2022-01-01') ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 60;
hospitalizations.queries.60days.WB: SELECT date, current_patients_hospital as val FROM WB_hospital WHERE val IS NOT NULL AND date >= DATETIME('now', '-60 day') ORDER BY date ASC;

DL.hospitalization.overall.query: SELECT D1.date, D1.active_cases, D2.hospital_beds_occupied FROM DL_cumulative D1 LEFT OUTER JOIN DL_patient_mgmt D2 ON D1.date == D2.date ORDER BY D1.date ASC;

DL.hospitalization.60days.query: SELECT D1.date, D1.hospital_beds_occupied, D2.moderate_patients, D2.severe_patients FROM DL_patient_mgmt D1 LEFT OUTER JOIN DL_hospitalizations D2 ON D1.date == D2.date WHERE D1.date >= DATETIME('now', '-30 day') ORDER BY D1.date;

DL.containment.zones.query: SELECT D1.date, D1.active_cases, D2.containment_zones FROM DL_cumulative D1 LEFT OUTER JOIN DL_containment D2 ON D1.date == D2.date ORDER BY D1.date;

DL.rtpcr.percentage.query: SELECT date, 100.0 * rtpcr_test_24h / (rtpcr_test_24h + antigen_test_24h) FROM DL_testing_status ORDER BY date ASC;

GA.hospitalization.query: SELECT date, home_isolation_new, hospitalized_patients_new,  hospital_discharged from GA_overview ORDER by date ASC;

HR.gender.wise.samples.query: SELECT date, samples_positive_cumulative_male, samples_positive_cumulative_female FROM HR_case_info ORDER BY date ASC;

HR.home.isolation.query: SELECT date, active_cases, people_home_isolation FROM HR_case_info ORDER BY date ASC;

KA.gender.wise.fatalities.query: select strftime('%Y-%m', date) as month, UPPER(sex) as sex_upper, count(*) from KA_individual_fatalities WHERE sex_upper in ('F', 'M') GROUP BY month, sex_upper ORDER BY month ASC;

KA.age.wise.fatalities.query: select strftime('%Y-%m', dod) as month, age from KA_individual_fatalities WHERE month >= '2020-05' ORDER BY month ASC;
